columns.title: Unbeatable value, locked in to 2026
columns.description: Get more for less with LycaMobile Pay Monthly. Enjoy all the data, minutes, and texts you need, with prices guaranteed until 2026. No surprises, just great value.

columns.title: Flexibility at your fingertips
columns.description: You are in control. Upgrade or set spend caps anytime with our flexible plans—no hidden charges, just pure freedom, plain and simple.

columns.title: Stay connected, wherever you roam
columns.description: Travel with peace knowing EU roaming is included in your plan. Stay connected to what matters, no matter where you go.

contentSequences.reason: Expandable Q&A content - matches accordion-faq block

items.question: Is roaming included with my pay monthly UK SIM only plan?
items.answer: Yes, EU roaming is included with all pay monthly plans.

items.question: How do I activate my pay monthly eSIM?
items.answer: You can activate your eSIM through the Lyca Mobile app or website.

items.question: Is there a credit check for pay monthly SIM only contracts?
items.answer: A soft credit check may be performed for pay monthly contracts.

items.question: How do I transfer my number to a new pay monthly SIM only plan?
items.answer: Request a PAC code from your current provider and provide it during signup.

items.question: What happens if I don't pay my pay monthly SIM contract on time?
items.answer: Late payments may result in service suspension. Contact us for payment arrangements.

items.question: What to do if you face issues with pay monthly SIM?
items.answer: Contact our customer support team for assistance with any issues.
